cards.title: Chill Touch
cards.description: Create a spectral hand to attack a creature, dealing necrotic damage and preventing healing until your next turn. Undead targets have disadvantage on attacks against you. Damage increases with levels.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Chill Touch**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **high elf druid** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: Create a spectral hand to attack a creature, dealing necrotic damage and preventing healing until your next turn.. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.

cards.title: Entangle
cards.description: Entangling plants sprout in a 20-ft square, creating difficult terrain. Creatures must save or be restrained. They can attempt to break free with a Strength check. Plants vanish when the spell ends.

cards.title: Healing Word
cards.description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Healing Word**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.
